anytime: Some men see things as they are, and ask why. I dream of things that never were, and ask why not. - Robert Kennedy

Be focused. Be determined. Be hopeful. Be empowered. - Michelle Obama
The best way out is always through. - Robert Frost
There’s power in looking silly and not caring that you do. - Amy Poehler
I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear. - Martin Luther King, Jr.
Be the one who decided to go for it. - Anonymous
Bravery is the solution to regret. - Robin Sharma
If you can imagine it, you can achieve it. If you can dream it, you can become it. - William Arthur Ward
You never know how strong you are until being strong is the only choice you have. - Anonymous

If you're not making mistakes, then you're not making decisions. - Catherine Cook

Not having the best situation, but seeing the best in your situation is the key to happiness. - Maria Forleo

Anything's possible if you've got enough nerve. - J. K. Rowling

Keep smiling, because life is a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about. - Marilyn Monroe

Never let your fear decide your fate. - Anonymous

Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do. - Benjamin Spock
Feelings are just visitors. Let them come and go. - Mooji

Sometimes the questions are complicated and the answers are simple. - Dr. Seuss
You will get all you want in life if you help enough other people get what they want. - Zig Ziglar
Adopt the pace of nature, her secret is patience. - Ralph Emerson

If you can change your mind, you can change your life. - William James

What you do everyday matters more than what you do once in a while. - Gretchen Rubin

Look for something positive each day, even if some days you have to look a little harder. - Unknown

Rise above the storm and you will find the sunshine. - Mario Fernandez

Be who you were created to be, and you will set the world on fire. - St. Catherine of Sienna

If you listen to your fears, you will die never knowing what a great person you might have been. - Robert Schuller

morning: Who needs coffee when you have your smile?
afternoon: You're more fun than bubble wrap!
evening: You made someone smile today, I know it.
The day was better for your efforts.
